## ChatHeadless.report() method

Send Chat related analytics event to Yext Analytics API.

**Signature:**

```typescript
report(eventPayload: Omit<ChatEventPayLoad, 'chat'> & DeepPartial<Pick<ChatEventPayLoad, 'chat'>>): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  eventPayload | Omit&lt;ChatEventPayLoad, 'chat'&gt; &amp; DeepPartial&lt;Pick&lt;ChatEventPayLoad, 'chat'&gt;&gt; |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Remarks

once a CHAT\_IMPRESSION analytics event is reported, subsequent CHAT\_IMPRESSION reports will not be send.
